tns:patch.author: acartaleanu
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_geocodes CASCADE; CREATE VIEW v_geocodes AS SELECT aal.amp_activity_id, acvl.geo_code, acvl.id, sum(aal.location_percentage) AS percentage, COUNT(*) - COUNT(aal.location_percentage) AS cnt_nulls FROM amp_activity_location aal JOIN amp_category_value_location acvl ON aal.location_id = acvl.id GROUP BY aal.amp_activity_id, acvl.geo_code, acvl.id;
